Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller

Class StandardCommandStrategy

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.StandardCommandStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
CommandStrategy
public class StandardCommandStrategy extends Object implements CommandStrategy
This class represents the standard concrete CommandStrategy to use for the managing of a UserCommand (if the match is not in a rejoining state).

  • Constructor Details

  • Method Details

    • manageCommand

      public void manageCommand(Tuple<UserCommand,Dispatcher> command, Match match)
      Manages a command on a match. It asks the model instance (Game instance) for the changing of its state and:
      • If the changes bring the Game to a legal state, apply it and send the UPDATE message in broadcast to the players that are connected to that Game
      • If the update is invalid, notify the player with a ERROR message
      Specified by:
      manageCommand in interface CommandStrategy
      Parameters:
      command - the UserCommand to manage
      match - the Match on which to apply the command
